Text: Important update on your NewPower serviceSeptember Dear JEFFREY SKILLING We are writing to you and the thousands of other Texas households who have chosen NewPower as their new Retail Electric Provider to keep you informed on the latest developments in the Texas Electric Choice Pilot program There have been delays in implementing the Texas Electric Choice Pilot program but none of these delays are going to ultimately prevent NewPower from using our energy expertise to deliver savings on electricity to our customers Nor will they prevent your local utility from providing the same reliable service Here is the latest information from the Public Utility Commission of Texas PUCT After several delays we are pleased to announce the Electric Reliability Council of Texas ERCOT began processing switch requests to NewPower on July Unfortunately the switch requests are being processed by ERCOT at a much slower pace than originally promised As a result based on past experience NewPower has been given estimates that your actual switch date could take place anytime between now and November NewPower must comply with the revised ERCOT timetable We cant supply you with electricity until ERCOT processes the switch request But heres what we can do First and foremost we want to assure you that we are committed to providing the stability and value you were promised when you signed up with NewPower for electricity supply despite these delays As soon as your switch request is processed by ERCOT well send you a welcome letter notifying you that your service has been switched to NewPower In the meantime we are doing everything we can to encourage ERCOT to process your switch request more quickly so that you can receive the savings you expect from NewPower as soon as possible If you have any questions or concerns please visit the Public Utility Commissions website at or call NewPower at Regards Nick Utton This is for information only Please do not reply to this message If youd like to be removed from this list please send an email to mailto
